Articles.Content:
this is a plane i made with the c7 mods packs

it is very very stable and can reach over Mach 1 (330mps)

it can also do vertical landings with RCS but you will need to add landing gear (i didn\'t add landing gear because it kills the look)

i hope you enjoy this plane

Here is a video i made on it:

https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!165&id=99F104C10E21B212%21165#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21166
